qa_test: Settings: General form has workspace name field / Settings: AI Models has model cards
change_summary: Enhanced documentation to clarify Settings page UI patterns. For Workspace Name: documented that the name is not directly editable via input field; instead, users must click the 'Edit' button. For AI Models: added explanation that workspaces may show empty state or 'No AI models available' message depending on plan and configuration. Model cards may not appear on first load for free/trial workspaces.
issue: QA tests looked for input field and model cards but found Edit button pattern and empty states. Tests expected different UI patterns than implemented.
resolution: Updated docs to describe actual UI patterns: Edit button for workspace name, conditional model card display based on plan
